value.query: Select Id,QuoteId, InitialMembers__c, 	InitialSubscribers__c, RecordType__c, TermDate__c, Competitor__r.Name, CompetitorStatus__c, Group_Number__c, Pooled_Non_Pooled__c,Package_has_been_attached__c, CompletionMarker__c, PLComplete__c, Contract_Codes__c, product2.Product_Family__c, product2.Network__c, HPCC_Code__c,Product2.Deductible_Amount__c, Product2.Coinsurance__c,(Select Id, Product2Id, ProductName__c, Product2.Name, Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__AttributeDefaultValues__c, Contract_Codes__c, product2.Product_Family__c, product2.Network__c, HPCC_Code__c, Product2.Deductible_Amount__c, Product2.Coinsurance__c,  OpportunityEffectiveDate__c, Opportunity_Type__c, IsPartOfAMigration__c, Date_Migrated_to_WGS__c, Situs_State_Abbrev__c, ProductStage__c, Probability__c, Is_HSA_Selected_Plan__c, CPLCodes__c, ClaimsPlatform__c,  ParentQuoteLineItem__r.Product2.Name,  ParentQuoteLineItem__r.Product2.Bundle__c, ParentQuoteLineItem__r.Quote.IsGroupNumberExist__c, LoggedInUserProfile__c, Market__c, LG_Plan_Config_Exception__c, Product2.Category__c, AnthemEntityTransform__c, Product2.RecordType.Name, Cards_Product_Config_Action_Name__c, Pooled_Non_Pooled__c, Package_has_been_attached__c, CompletionMarker__c, ActWiseChildQuote__c, ActWiseChildQuote__r.IC_ProductStage__c, ActWiseChildQuote__r.CompletionMarker__c, ActWiseChildQuote__r.PLComplete__c, %vlocity_namespace%__ContractCode__c, Plan_Type__c, HW_Package_Name__c,Single_INN_provider_co_pay__c from Quote_Line_Items__r Order By ProductName__c ASC) From QuoteLineItem Where Id= '{{parent.obj.Id}}'
